Chapter 7 Combined Questionnaire & Syntaxes for all 5 indicators

Chapter 7 Combined Questionnaire & Syntaxes for all 5 indicators Chapters 4 - 7, presented the questionnaires and syntax by indicator. This resources below contain all the 5 food security direct evidence indicators as well as standardized geographic questions. 7.0.1 Paper Version of Questionnaire Here is comibined standardized module in word format: RBDstandardized_questionnairecombined_EN 7.0.2 Electronic Version of Questionnaire Here is combined standardized module in xlsform: RBDstandardized_questionnairecombined_EN 7.0.3 Example data set Here is the example raw data set: exampledataEnglish_raw 7.0.4 SPSS Syntax Here is the combined SPSS syntax file for calculating the 5 indicators: RBDstandardized_Rsyntaxcombined_EN Note - still looking for a way to create creates the variables ADMIN1Code & ADMIN2Code from the variables ADMIN1Name & ADMIN2Name in SPSS 7.0.5 R Syntax Here is the combined R syntax file for calculating the 5 indicators: RBDstandardized_Rsyntaxcombined_EN note that the R code above creates the variables ADMIN1Code & ADMIN2Code from the variables ADMIN1Name & ADMIN2Name
